datasets.dataset_title: Government buildings and facilities maintained by ArchSD
datasets.dataset_notes: This dataset provides information of government buildings and facilities maintained by ArchSD in FGDB format for releasing to CSDI portal. Please observe the relevant terms and conditions of the CSDI portal when using the information contained in this dataset.

datasets.dataset_title: Trees on SIMAR Slopes Maintained by ArchSD
datasets.dataset_notes: This dataset provides information of the trees on Registered Man-made Slopes maintained by ArchSD in FGDB format for releasing to CSDI portal. Please observe the relevant terms and conditions of the CSDI portal when using the information contained in this dataset.

datasets.dataset_title: Hong Kong Green Building Council (HKGBC) BEAM Plus Assessment Final Grading for Completed Capital Works Projects managed by the Architectural Services Department
datasets.dataset_notes: This dataset provides the final grading, assessment version, overall score and project completion year of BEAM Plus certification for new completed capital works projects managed by the Architectural Services Department.

datasets.dataset_title: Awarded Contractors under Green Contractor Awards
datasets.dataset_notes: This dataset provides the details of awarded contractors under the Green Contractor Award of the Architectural Services Department (including award type, awarded contractor name and the project awarded)
